Body.Content:
To improve performance and reliability, we have scheduled planned maintenance for the Windows 365 service. This maintenance will occur during non-peak hours, based on the Client Deviceâ€™s local time zone, to minimize potential impact on your organization. For organizations with users across multiple regions, we recognize that non-peak hours may vary. Maintenance will take place separately in each region, affecting only users connecting from that location during the scheduled time. The times listed below indicate the actual maintenance start times for each region, not adjusted for different time zones.

During this period, there will be no service downtime. Users are expected to experience little to no disruption.

Maintenance Schedule:

  • Start Date: July 7, 2025
  • End Date: July 12, 2025

Daily Maintenance Window Start Times:

  • Africa: 23:00 UTC
  • Asia Pacific: 16:30 UTC
  • Australia: 14:00 UTC
  • Europe: 00:00 UTC
  • India: 19:30 UTC
  • North America: 06:00 UTC
  • South America: 05:00 UTC

Daily Maintenance Window End Times:

  • Africa: 03:00 UTC
  • Asia Pacific: 20:30 UTC
  • Australia: 18:00 UTC
  • Europe: 04:00 UTC
  • India: 23:30 UTC
  • North America: 10:00 UTC
  • South America: 09:00 UTC

How does this affect my organization?

  • During the maintenance window, users actively connected via UDP relay may experience brief, automatic reconnections, with each disconnection lasting less than a minute.
  • While the total planned impact duration is up to 4 hours within the maintenance window, disconnections will only occur 1-2 times and will not persist throughout the entire 4-hour period.
  • Users can establish new connections without impact during the maintenance window. The service will remain fully available without any downtime.

What do I need to do to prepare for this change?

No further action is required, as systems will automatically recover from any temporary interruptions. You may want to notify your helpdesk and end-users of the scheduled maintenance and the potential for brief disruptions.

We are committed to providing a seamless experience and appreciate your understanding as we carry out this necessary maintenance to enhance the reliability of Windows 365 services.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Planned maintenance for Windows 365 will occur from July 7 to July 12, 2025, during non-peak hours in each region. Users may experience brief reconnections, but no service downtime is expected. No action is required, but notifying helpdesk and end-users of potential brief disruptions is recommended.
